meaning: pull an all-nighter, stay up all night
description: To stay awake through the entire night until dawn.

examples.translation: Pulled an all-nighter twice in one week

examples.chinese: 年轻人在周末吃早餐,不是因为起得早,是熬穿了
examples.translation: Young people eating breakfast on weekends isn't because they woke up early, it's because they stayed up all night

examples.chinese: 明知今天要上一天班还熬夜熬穿了,现在生不如死
examples.translation: Knew I had to work all day but still stayed up all night, now I feel worse than dead
